East_Orange.Mesivta Zichron Baruch: Mesivta Zichron Baruch, (Hebrew: מתיבתא זכרון ברוך‎), established in 2007 and, also known as Mesivta of Clifton, is an Orthodox Jewish high school in Clifton, New Jersey led by Rabbi Halberstadt. As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 65 students and 11.5 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 5.7:1. The school's student body was 100.0% White.
